info.title: Diffbot
info.description:
Diffbot extracts data from web pages automatically and returns structured JSON. For example, our Article API returns an article's title, author, date and full-text. Use the web as your database!

We use computer vision, machine learning and natural language processing to add structure to just about any web page.

get.description: The Article API is used to extract clean article text from news articles, blog posts, and other text-heavy web pages.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Send in a list of comma-separated fieldnames to override default field output in the response.

parameters.name: paging
parameters.description: Send paging=false to disable automatic concatenation of multi-page articles.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Specify a value in milliseconds (e.g., &timeout=15000) to override the default API timeout of 5000ms.

get.description: The Frontpage API takes in a multifaceted “homepage” and returns individual page elements.

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: Returns all content from page, including navigation and similar links that the Diffbot visual processing engine considers less important / non-core.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format the response output in xml (default) or json

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Specify a value in milliseconds (e.g., &timeout=15000) to override the default API timeout of 5000ms.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Frontpage URL from which to extract items

get.description: The Product API retrieves full product data from any e-commerce shopping page.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Send in a list of comma-separated fieldnames to override default field output in the response.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Specify a value in milliseconds (e.g., &timeout=15000) to override the default API timeout of 5000ms.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the page to process.
